}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:20.419
    | text      = So we're going to start off here and Alex does get into Afghanistan a little bit off
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:26.059
    | text      = the jump.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:27.379
    | text      = Taliban after 20 years and two point trillion dollars spent to create this United Nations
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:38.500
    | text      = utopia of love and kindness and goodness, really all been a giant fraud to get the opium.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:46.039
    | text      = It's all been a giant scam to secure the country for China so they can get trillions of dollars
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:51.620
    | text      = in rare earth minerals out of the country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:55.620
    | text      = And now China is moving in to replace the United States as the new empire to take control,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:00.500
    | text      = but they don't need to use any violence.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:02.659
    | text      = They'll just simply buy off the Taliban.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:06.740
    | text      = Didn't we try that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:08.039
    | text      = They're trying to blame President Trump for what has happened, but he had a completely
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:13.100
    | text      = different plan of withdrawal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:16.279
    | text      = This has been a panic withdrawal, almost as if they wanted this to happen on purpose.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:26.179
    | text      = Helicopters are evacuating staff from the U.S. Embassy in Kabul as the Taliban entered
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:29.779
    | text      = the Afghan capital from all sides.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:33.179
    | text      = So I'm sure some people are trying to blame Trump for the current situation in Afghanistan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:37.299
    | text      = And I would agree that that's kind of looking at too small of a picture.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:40.899
    | text      = I would say the same of people who'd like to throw a complete blame onto Biden.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:44.220
    | text      = I think it's yeah, it's a limited scope.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:46.259
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:47.259
    | text      = There's plenty of blame to go around to a whole lot of people, but I also kind of believe
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:50.539
    | text      = that assigning appropriate levels of blame isn't something that we're capable of doing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:54.240
    | text      = on this podcast.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:55.240
    | text      = So I don't even want to engage it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:57.100
    | text      = Sure, sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:58.100
    | text      = Alex is in a really tough situation here for his narratives because the taking of Kabul
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:02.820
    | text      = is the direct result of the United States withdrawing troops, which is something that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:06.779
    | text      = he's championed for a long time now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:09.840
    | text      = In the lead up to the 2016 and 2020 elections, Alex presented Trump as the peace candidate
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:14.500
    | text      = in opposition to Clinton and Biden, who were hawks seeking to keep these conflicts going
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:19.179
    | text      = indefinitely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:20.179
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:21.179
    | text      = It was a major selling point for Alex that Trump wanted to bring the troops home.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:24.139
    | text      = And for what it's worth, that's one of the territories where we came closest to agreement
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:28.700
    | text      = with the positions that Alex espoused.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:32.279
    | text      = In October 2020, Trump announced that he wanted to withdraw all US troops from Afghanistan
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.740
    | text      = by Christmas.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:38.019
    | text      = I'm not sure what qualifies to Alex as a gradual withdrawal, but considering how long the war
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:42.360
    | text      = dragged on, it seems like that's not super gradual.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:46.179
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:47.179
    | text      = The Taliban celebrated this announcement, mostly because it was in keeping in line with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:50.659
    | text      = Trump's obligation under the Doha Agreement, which was signed in February 2020 between
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:55.620
    | text      = the United States and the Taliban.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:57.960
    | text      = One of the major points of this agreement was the US, quote, committed to withdraw from
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:01.759
    | text      = Afghanistan all military forces of the United States, its allies and coalition partners,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:06.940
    | text      = including all non diplomatic civilian personnel, private security contractors, trainers, advisors,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:12.179
    | text      = and supporting service personnel within 14 months following announcement of this agreement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:17.700
    | text      = After his election in April 2021, Biden gave a speech where he laid out his plans as they
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:22.539
    | text      = related to troop withdrawal from Afghanistan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:25.559
    | text      = According to the Doha Agreement, troops were supposed to be out within 14 months or by
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:29.419
    | text      = May 1st.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:30.960
    | text      = Biden decided to begin the withdrawal then with the goal of being out by September 11th.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:35.620
    | text      = Fun symbolism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:37.220
    | text      = Yeah, great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:38.840
    | text      = In the past months, many of our allies like Germany and Italy have withdrawn their troops.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:43.299
    | text      = And as we've withdrawn, the Taliban has come in and taken over the capital and everything
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:47.139
    | text      = is a real tragedy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:49.500
    | text      = This is a hard thing to wrap your head around from the people who are in Afghanistan right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:53.480
    | text      = now to the veterans who are wrestling with these developments and their own personal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:58.299
    | text      = relationship to the people who it's just it's staggering the amount of people who are suffering.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
